pr_title: Improve logging for tier mgmt task

timeline.message: add unit test for failed tier move

timeline.bodyText:
This comment is from 530c4c3 it doesn't make sense here anymore. We have changed how the space allocation works largely. When the move task failed, it can be due to many more reasons than just a transient error here, for example:

The target location is full and this move operation does not evict
Eviction failed since the target is full of pinned blocks
We evict on the target location but the free space is stolen by someone else
maybe an unfound bug from concurrency

Basically this TODO can be removed.
timeline.author: jiacheliu3
